title: Victoria Mboko defeats Naomi Osaka at National Bank Open
description: Victoria Mboko, an 18-year-old wild card from Canada, beat four-time grand slam champion Naomi Osaka in the Canadian Open final.
content:
Headbanging birds? How cockatoos get down just like us These fine-feathered friends know how to get down. CNN's Channon Hodge explains how dozens of videos on social media helped researchers identify all the ways cockatoos cut a rug. Headbanging birds? How cockatoos get down just like us

Apple CEO Tim Cook gifted President Donald Trump a plaque made of glass manufactured in Corning’s Harrodsburg, Kentucky, which he announced would be the cover glass on all iPhones and Apple Watches soon.

South Korean forward Son Heung-min officially signed with Los Angeles Football Club (LAFC) on a permanent transfer. Son was welcomed by chants from the club’s passionate fanbase as he walked onto the stage for his unveiling.

James Cameron’s planned film on Hiroshima and Nagasaki ‘a sacred duty' to survivors Film director James Cameron tells CNN's Christiane Amanpour he is adapting the book, "Ghosts of Hiroshima" by Charles Pellegrino into a film that he "has to make" partly because of a pledge he made to Tsutomu Yamaguchi, a survivor of both the Hiroshima and Nagasaki bombings. James Cameron’s planned film on Hiroshima and Nagasaki ‘a sacred duty' to survivors

This man swims with his pet alligator Frau Meyer, an 8-foot-long alligator, is a pet to retired circus performers in Germany. She spends her days living with the Kaulis family, swimming and sunbathing. This man swims with his pet alligator

NHL mascot and player have close call with bear Video posted on X shows The Seattle Kraken’s mascot “Buoy” fishing with teammate John Hayden in Anchorage, Alaska, when they had a close call with a bear. NHL mascot and player have close call with bear

According to the Australian Institute of Marine Science (AIMS), parts of the Great Barrier Reef suffered their biggest-ever declines last year after a marine heatwave bleached vast swaths of hard coral.

The apartment she bought is perfect. The owner just has to die first There is a morbid loophole that could get you a Paris apartment for half the price. The French viager system is a real estate deal where buyers essentially bet on how long the seller has left to live. The apartment she bought is perfect. The owner just has to die first

Neil deGrasse Tyson reacts to proposal for nuclear power on the moon CNN's Victor Blackwell speaks with astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson about NASA's desire to make the US the first country to put a nuclear reactor on the moon. Neil deGrasse Tyson reacts to proposal for nuclear power on the moon

Former Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau was seen singing and dancing at a Katy Perry concert in Montreal in late July. Two days earlier, Trudeau and Perry were seen having dinner together, sparking dating rumors across social media.

keywords.name: Former Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau

summary: Apple CEO Tim Cook gifted President Donald Trump a plaque made of glass manufactured in Corning's Harrodsburg, Kentucky, which he announced will be the cover glass on all iPhones and Apple Watches soon. South Korean forward Son Heung-min officially signed with Los Angeles Football Club (LAFC) on a permanent transfer. James Cameron’s planned film on Hiroshima and Nagasaki is ‘a sacred duty’ to survivors, partly due to a pledge he made to Tsutomu Yamaguchi, a survivor of both the Hiroshima bombings. The Australian Institute of Marine Science (AIMS) reported that parts of the Great Barrier Reef experienced their biggest-ever declines last year due to an unexpected marine heatwave. Former Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau was seen performing at a Katy Perry concert, sparking dating rumors.
shortSummary: Apple CEO Tim Cook presented President Donald Trump with a glass plaque made in Corning, highlighting his support for Hiroshima survivors and discussing his upcoming film.

As Trump’s deadline for Russia comes due, White House preps for possible summit with Putin
President Donald Trump’s deadline for Russia to end its war in Ukraine or suffer severe economic punishment expires Friday, but it’s unclear how he plans to proceed amid new efforts toward a summit with Vladimir Putin and delicate trade negotiations with China.

Five ways the Russia-Ukraine war could end
A Trump-Putin meeting has been floated by both sides for some time. So why might either side want it to happen now?

CNN reporter presses Trump on potential Putin meeting
1:25
President Donald Trump said he would not condition a potential sit-down with Vladimir Putin on the Russian president also meeting with Ukraine’s leader. CNN’s Kaitlan Collins explains the significance of his change in tune.

What you need to know about Trump’s historic new tariffs
President Donald Trump just enacted a new wave of tariffs on dozens of America’s trading partners, marking a substantial escalation in ongoing trade tensions that could constitute the biggest change to the global economy in nearly a century.

Trump remade the global trading system. He’s just getting started

Toyota, world’s biggest carmaker, warns of unprecedented $9.5 billion profit hit from tariffs
Japan’s Toyota Motor said Thursday that it expected a profit hit of nearly $10 billion from President Donald Trump’s tariffs on cars imported into the United States, the highest such estimate yet by any company.

argos_summary: Researchers have discovered that cockatoos exhibit dancing behaviors similar to humans, as evidenced by numerous social media videos. This finding highlights the birds' ability to synchronize their movements to music, showcasing their intelligence and social nature.
